content: this one touches 34 files so I'd really appreciate if it got merged fast (or told it's a bad idea similarly as fast) before it gets into merge conflictland. If people want to push to it, feel free (I'm going to sleep right now); it built on my local machine so hopefully CI agrees
It seems like you've had to add a lot more @s to make things work
Yeah, I'm not unopposed to re-adding the old versions for a bit whilst the out-param elaboration isn't great
